data.title: Gloucestershire death notices and funeral announcements made in the last week
data.meta_description: People from Gloucester, Cheltenham, Stroud, Tewkesbury, Forest of Dean and Cotswolds are being remembered
data.text:
Announcing the passing of a loved one in local news media is a long standing tradition and we are proud of the trust placed in us to make these important announcements. Every notice published to our newspaper and news site also appears on funeral-notices.co.uk - the UKâ€™s number one site for death notices and memoriams.

Every notice remains online forever providing friends and families with a lifelong tribute to their loved one, a safe place online to share memories, add tributes, photographs and make donations in memory. Each week we pay tribute to the loved ones remembered in our area with a funeral notice and online tribute page.

To read the latest announcements and add tributes to those from our area who have passed away, or to create a funeral notice yourself, click here . Alternatively, you can create a notice by calling our helpful team on 01482 908084.

Paul Roger BAIRD

Formerly of Cleevemount Road, Cheltenham. Passed away in Gloucester Royal Hospital on Tuesday 23rd July 2024, aged 76 years. Loving father of Tabatha and Samantha, grandfather to Ryan, Nathan and Ollie, great-grandfather to Mila and Hudson. A dear brother to Sandra and Linda and uncle to Louise, Joanne and Sally. He will be sadly missed by all their families. His funeral will be held at Cheltenham Crematorium, Willow Chapel at 11.30am on Tuesday 20th August 2024. Family flowers only, donations if desired for Acorns Children's Hospice may be left in the collection, given online at www.masonandstokes.co.uk or sent c/o Mason & Stokes, 54 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham GL52 6AH

Pamela June BOOTHROYD

Of Gloucester Formerly of Macclesfield and Huddersfield. Passed away peacefully at home on 21st July 2024, aged 87 years. Beloved wife of the late John, much loved mother of Jane, Helen and James and mother-in-law of Chris, Dave and Gemma. Loving grandmother of Sam, Alex, Sophie, Tom, Holly, Jade, Lauren and Jack. Funeral service will be held at Gloucester Crematorium on Monday 12th August 2024 at 11.00am. Family flowers only. Donations to Macmillan Cancer Support may be left in the collection box after the service or sent to: SC & BS Cocks Funeral Directors, 50 Hucclecote Road, Gloucester. GL3 3TL

Michael Gordon BROOKINGS (Mike)

(Mike) Passed away peacefully on 19th July 2024, aged 89 years. Beloved husband of the late Pamela. Dearly loved dad of Christine, Ian and Andrew. Much loved grandad and great-grandad. Mike will be sadly missed by all his family and friends. The Funeral service will take place at St Peter's Church, Haresfield on Monday 12th August 2024 at 11.00am. Family flowers only but donations in memory of Mike will be gratefully received on behalf of St Peter's Church, Parkinsons UK and The League of Friends at Cirencester Hospital. All enquiries to: Ian George (Funerals) Ltd, 251 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham, GL51 8NW. Tel: 01242 530683

Janet Alice CORDERY

Janet Cordery passed away surrounded by her family and the caring nursing staff at Gloucester Royal Hospital, aged 77, after a short residence with Woodstock Care Home. Janet was a loving and kind mother to; Sally, Penny, Wendy and Roger. Janet was also a loved, fun, loving Nanny to; Autumn, Luke, Solomon, Rueben, Daisy, Sebastian and Talulah. She had 9 great grandchildren and was a wonderful mother in law to Mike, Murph. The Funeral service will be held at Cheltenham Crematorium, Willow Chapel on the 20th August at 10:30am. Family flowers only, donations in lieu can be made to Alzheimer's Society UK www.alzheimers.org.uk/get-involved/donate All enquiries C/O The Co-Operative FuneralCare Cheltenham, Grosvenor House, 72 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham, GL51 6QL.

Horace Charles (Ben) FREEBURY

(Ben) Passed away peacefully in Gloucestershire Royal Hospital on 18th July aged 92. Husband to the late June, Father to Martin, Alan, John and Wendy. Grandfather and Great Grandfather. Sadly missed. R.I.P. Funeral service to be held in the Oak Chapel at Cheltenham Crematorium on Friday 16th August 2024 at 12.00 noon. Flowers or donations to Alzheimer's Research may be sent c/o Goodwins Funeral Directors, 8 Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester. GL2 OAW Telephone 01452 500770

Kirry John FREWIN

Sadly passed away on the 17th July 2024, aged 61 years. A loving Son to Kirry Arnold Frewin and the late Ann Rosemary Frewin, Brother to Angela and Karl. He will be greatly missed by all who knew and loved him. His funeral will be held in the Willow Chapel, Cheltenham Crematorium on Monday 5th August 2024 at 12.30. Donations given through the online newspaper notice will go to Sue Ryder Leckhampton Hospice. Enquiries to W. S. Trenhaile Funeral Directors, Apostle House, 175 London Road, Cheltenham, GL52 6HN.

Lorraine Ann HARRISON

Passed away on the 19th July 2024, at Gloucester Royal Hospital, aged 76 years. Loving wife of the late Herbert John Harrison and much loved mum to Natalia. Treasured Grandma to Damon and Lauretta. Service will take place at Cheltenham Crematorium Oak Chapel on Thursday 8th August at 2.00pm. Donations in lieu of flowers for Gloucester Royal Hospital. Enquiries to W. S. Trenhaile Funeral Directors, Apostle House, 175 London Road, Cheltenham, GL52 6HN.

Evelyn May HORRIDGE

Eve Horridge passed away peacefully at home on 19th July 2024, aged 87 years, Much loved Auntie and dear friend to so many. The funeral Service will take place at Gloucester Crematorium Chapel on Friday 9th August 2024 at 11.00am, followed by interment in the cemetery. Family flowers only, donations in memory of Eve will be kindly received for 'Gloucester City Mission' may be sent to: Ian George (Funerals) Ltd, 251 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham, GL51 8NW. Tel: 01242 530683

David William (Formerly of Swindon Village, Cheltenham) ILIFFE

(Formerly of Swindon Village, Cheltenham) Sadly passed away on Thursday 25th July 2024, aged 90 years. Much-loved Husband of Marlene. Dear Father to Jon and the late Caryn. Wonderful Father-in-Law, Grandfather and Great-Grandfather. Funeral Service to take place at Cheltenham Crematorium, Willow Chapel on Tuesday 13th August 2024 at 2:30pm. Donations, if desired, in memory of Caryn for "Cancer Research UK" c/o Allen-White Funeral Directors, Crown Mews, Bath Road, King's Stanley, Stonehouse, Gloucestershire, GL10 3JG. Tel: 01453 822 409.

Michael Robert JOHNS

Passed away peacefully on 26th July 2024 at Gloucester Royal Hospital. Much loved Husband of Gill. Devoted Dad to Rachael and Anne-Marie. Proud Grampy of James, Joe and Ted. Funeral service to take place on Thursday 8th August 2024 at 1pm At Gloucester Crematorium. Family Flowers only. Bright colours welcome. Donations if lieu of flowers to Help for Heroes or Diabetes UK. maybe sent c/o SC And BS Cocks Funeral Directors 59 Hucclecote road Gloucester GL3 3TL. 01452 617 892

John LEADBEATER

Passed away on Sunday 21st July 2024 at his home in Frampton-on-Severn surrounded by his loving family at the age of 78 years. Beloved husband of Sue, much loved dad of Stephen and loving brother of David. Funeral service will be taking place at St Mary's Church, Frampton-on-Severn on Wednesday 7th August at 12 noon. Family flowers only please, donations in memory of John to 'Longfield Hospice Care', may be sent to W.B. Wood & Son, Funeral Directors, The Ferns, Church Lane, Saul, Gloucester, GL2 7JY. 01452 740728.

Elke NICHOLSON

Passed away 28th July 2024 at her villa in Spain after many illnesses bravely borne. Beloved wife of George, mother to Nadya and Samy, grandmother to James, Faris and Zahra and sister to Christa. Tel: 0034688705480

Sylvia SIMMONDS

Sylvia Simmonds passed away on the 16th July 2024, formerly of 11 Shephard Mead, Tewkesbury. A Funeral service will be held at Tewkesbury Abbey on 8 August 2024 at 1.30pm, followed by committal at Cheltenham Crematorium at 3.30pm. No flowers. Donations if desired to 'Friends of Tewkesbury Abbey'. Alexander Burn Funeral Directors, 23-24 High Street, Tewkesbury, GL20 5AL

Rosemary (Rosie, Rose) STERRY (nee Wintle)

(nee Wintle) of Ruardean Woodside Passed away in Gloucestershire Royal Hospital, aged 84 years on 19th July 2024. Beloved Mother of Celia (Australia), Mother-in-Law of John and Mother of the late Graham. Much loved Nannie Rose to Craig, Jodie, Jennifer and Scarlett. Dear Sister to Eva and Sister-in-Law to Keith and dearest Aunty to Robert, Richard and Clare. Funeral Service at St Lawrence Church, Taynton on Tuesday 20th August at 11am followed by interment at Yew Tree Brake Cemetery. Family flowers only, donations for the Midlands Air Ambulance or Cancer Research UK may be sent care of Smiths Funeral Services Ltd, Furnace Lane, Newent GL18 1DD

Patricia Eleanor WILSON

Passed away peacefully on Wednesday 24th July 2024, aged 84. Adored and adoring Mother and Grandmother. Polymath and practitioner. Generous and loving. Her funeral will be held on Thursday 8th August 2024, 2.30pm in the Willow Chapel of Cheltenham Crematorium. In lieu of flowers, please make donations for South Cheltenham Youth online at www.masonandstokes.co.uk or send c/o Mason & Stokes, 54 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham GL52 6AH Rest peacefully Tricia.

To add your own tributes to the loved ones from our area, or to publish a notice for your loved one, visit funeral-notices.co.uk

Our thoughts are with the family and friends of those we have lost.
